liveServerSpeed.language.description: Language used by the extension (en, fr, es, de) (Settings will change language after restarting VS Code)
liveServerSpeed.debounceTime.description: Debounce time in milliseconds for file change detection and instant preview updates (50-1000ms)
liveServerSpeed.relaunchShortcut.descrip: Default keyboard shortcut for relaunching the server with last parameters (user can override in keybindings.json)
liveServerSpeed.openKeybindings.descript: Open Keyboard Shortcuts for Live Server Speed Edition (set to true to open)
liveServerSpeed.defaultIP.description: Default IP address for the server (leave empty to auto-detect)
liveServerSpeed.httpsCertPath.descriptio: Path to TLS certificate file to use for HTTPS (optional). If empty and auto-generate is enabled, the extension will create one.
liveServerSpeed.httpsKeyPath.description: Path to TLS private key file to use for HTTPS (optional). If empty and auto-generate is enabled, the extension will create one.
liveServerSpeed.httpsAutoGenerate.descri: When true, the extension will auto-generate and store a self-signed certificate for HTTPS if no certificate paths are provided.
